data.chText: （事情发生的）背景，环境，来龙去脉
data.enText: the situation in which sth happens and that helps you to understand it

data.chText: 这篇演说需要放到20世纪60年代的英国这一背景之下来看待。
data.enText: This speech needs to be set in the context of Britain in the 1960s.

data.chText: 只有了解来龙去脉才能明白他的决定。
data.enText: His decision can only be understood in context .
the words that come just before and after a word, phrase or statement and help you to understand its meaning

data.chText: 你应该能从上下文猜出这个词的含义。
data.enText: You should be able to guess the meaning of the word from the context.
This quotation has been taken out of context (= repeated without giving the circumstances in which it was said) .

simple_means.memory_skill: con 共同 + text 编织 →〔内容〕共同编织在一起的 → 上下文

means: (事情发生的)背景，环境，来龙去脉

tr: discourse that surrounds a language unit and helps to determine its interpretation
the set of facts or circumstances that surround a situation or event

value.def: The context of an idea or event is the general situation that relates to it, and which helps it to be understood.

example.ex: We are doing this work in the context of reforms in the economic, social and cultural spheres.
example.tran: 我们是在对经济、社会、文化诸领域进行改革的背景下从事这项工作的。

example.ex: ...the historical context in which Chaucer wrote...
This is the context in which President Chirac must decide his policy.
example.tran: 这是希拉克总统必须确定其政策的背景。

gramarinfo.label: usu with supp, oft adj N, N <l>of</l> n

value.def: The context of a word, sentence, or text consists of the words, sentences, or text before and after it which help to make its meaning clear.

example.ex: Without a context, I would have assumed it was written by a man.
example.tran: 如果没有上下文，我会以为这是出自一名男子笔下。

value.def: If something is seen in context or if it is put into context, it is considered together with all the factors that relate to it.

example.ex: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context...
example.tran: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

example.ex: It is important that we put Jesus into the context of history.
example.tran: 我们将耶稣置于历史环境中来看是很重要的。

value.tran: 在上下文中;置于背景之下

value.def: If a statement or remark is quoted out of context, the circumstances in which it was said are not correctly reported, so that it seems to mean something different from the meaning that was intended.

example.ex: Thomas says that he has been taken out of context on the issue...
example.tran: 托马斯说，在这个问题上他的话被断章取义了。

example.ex: Quotes can be manipulated and used out of context.
example.tran: 引语可能会被篡改，使用时断章取义。

value.tran: 脱离上下文;断章取义地

trans: 在……情况下；在…的背景下；在…背景下
关于这点；由此而论；由于这个原因；在这个背景下
文化语境；文化背景；文化脉络；文化环境；文化氛围
社会环境；社会语境；社会情境；社会背景；融合了社交元素
环境菜单；上下文菜單；上下文菜单；快捷菜单；关联菜单
语境；言内语境；上下文；语言上下文；上下文语境
脱离上下文；断章取义地
设备场景；设备内容；设备描述表；设备上下文；设备环境
情景语境；语境；情境语境；情景语境理论；语言环境
内容切换；上下文切换；切换；上下文交换；上下文转换

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 共同 + text 编织 →〔内容〕共同编织在一起的 → 上下文
pre 预先 + text 编织 → 预先编好的 → 借口
text 编织 + ile 物体 → 编织出的物品 → 纺织品
text 编织 + ure 表结果 → 编织的状态、结果 → 结构；质地
